content:
The following are ports you need to have open on your router or firewall for Steam to operate normally.


[section style=section]  [h5]To log into Steam and download content:[/h5][list]  	[*]HTTP (TCP remote port 80) and HTTPS (443)[/*]  	[*]UDP remote port 27015-27050[/*]  	[*]TCP remote port 27015-27050[/*]  [/list]  [/section]
[section id=kb_ports]    	[section style=section]  		[h5]Steam Client[/h5][list]  			[*]UDP remote port 27000-27100: Game traffic[/*]  			[*]UDP local port 27031-27036: Remote Play[/*]  			[*]TCP local port 27036: Remote Play[/*]  			[*]UDP remote port 4380[/*]  		[/list]  	[/section]      	  		[h5]Dedicated or Listen Servers[/h5][list]  			[*]TCP local port 27015 (default): SRCDS Rcon port[/*]  			[*]UDP local port 27015 (default): gameplay traffic[/*]  		[/list]  	[/section]    	[section style=section]  		[h5]Steamworks P2P Networking and Steam Voice Chat[/h5][list]  			[*]UDP remote port 3478[/*]  			[*]UDP remote port 4379[/*]  			[*]UDP remote port 4380[/*] [*]UDP remote ports: 27014-27030[/*] 		[/list]  	[/section]        		[section style=important]  			[h3]Note:[/h3]Many university and business networks and proxies block required ports for Steam operation - please consult your network administrator to ensure the required ports are open if you are using a university/business network or a proxy. [b]Ports required for Steam can not be re-mapped to HTTP or reconfigured to a custom port range.[/b][/section]        [section id=kb_advanced]  	[h4]Advanced[/h4]For generic Steam HTTP/HTTPS requests, your proxy should allow the following domains:
[list]  		[*]steampowered.com[/*]  		[*]steamcommunity.com[/*]  		[*]steamgames.com[/*]  		[*]steamusercontent.com[/*]  		[*]steamcontent.com[/*]  		[*]steamstatic.com[/*]  		[*]akamaihd.net[/*]  	[/list]

Most of the non-web traffic is usually UDP but can be TCP as well. For that, the IPs will all be from the Valve network (AS32590), and a list of those IP blocks can be found here:
[list]  		[*][url=http://bgp.he.net/AS32590#_prefixes]IPv4[/url][/*]  		[*][url=http://bgp.he.net/AS32590#_prefixes6]IPv6[/url][/*]  	[/list]  [/section]
title: Required Ports for Steam
